title: Cap Ornament, mid-19th century
creditline: Gift of Georgina and Louisa L. Schuyler
description: Three broad bands interlocked to form a ball-shaped ornament, at top of a pin; similar, smaller ball attached by ashort chain.  Forms a pair with 1916-29-58.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cap Ornament, mid-19th century.
mid-19th century. Gold. Gift of Georgina and Louisa L. Schuyler. 1916-29-59.
